New Records: Adolis García set a record for the most RBIs in an ALCS with 15
Texas Rangers secured their first World Series berth since 2011
Bruce Bochy became the first manager to win a League Championship Series with three different teams
Key Match Events: Adolis García homered twice and drove in five runs
Cristian Javier was pulled after one out in the first inning
Corey Seager hit a long home run in the first inning
Rangers scored three runs in the first inning
Adolis García hit a two-run double in the fourth inning
Adolis García hit a grand slam in Game 6
Cristian Javier lost his first playoff start
Pre-Game Insights: Texas Rangers had a 8-0 playoff road record
The game was the second time the road team won every game in a best-of-seven postseason series
Post-Match Reflections: Dusty Baker praised the Astros' resilience
Bruce Bochy expressed gratitude for the opportunity to manage the Rangers
Miscellaneous Highlights: Adolis García was booed throughout the game
Jose Altuve hit his 27th career postseason homer
